comments: Might be good in person but was worthless online. Required a book published this year, but never gave a single assignment from it. I want my money back! Wasn\'t helpful with questions, couldn\'t figure out how the course blackboard worked, graded inconsistently. Only really gave 3 assignments, if one isn\'t good, you\'re screwed.

great professor, easy class, work somewhat hard for an A if things come easy to you- it\'s a breeze. he may however mix up a paper for his online classes which can turn out to be annoying, but everything works out without a problem.

Bryan was a great teacher for my first semester in college. The first paper we wrote really stressed me out, but everything else was easygoing. he made it clear that you have to bust your butt to get an a. I don\'t believe that was entirely true, or if it was just that clear and easy to me. great prof, interesting class minus the poems.

For a technical writing class where we\'re supposed to be working on topics like resumes and interviewing skills, we had to write a 12pg paper on a subject of our choosing relating to a teacher-given topic based on a poet and collaborating with several lost students as a group. 3rd most worthless teacher I\'ve had.
